flawed_nl_solution:
Each dress takes 4 square meters of fabric to make, so the number of dresses she can make will be 56/4 = <<56/4=14>>14 dresses.
Each dress takes 3 hours to make, thus she will have to work 14 dresses x 3 hours/dress = <<14*3=24>>24 hours.
#### 24

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 42, not 24. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
